title: Executive Order 5810-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, Utah
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 4426, dated April 19, 1926, which withdrew the public lands in T. 1 S., R. 2 E., Salt Lake meridian, Utah, pending a resurvey, be, and the same is hereby, revoked.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5810-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, Utah Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361411
